resources.string: 1. Who did Alice meet in Wonderland?
2. Who said the sentence below in the story?
She _____ the rabbit down to a hole and found herself in a hall with doors.
4. What happened when Alice ate the mushroom?
She could jump over the trees.
5. Why did the Duchess push the baby into Alice`s arms and hurry out of the room?
as she wanted to get some food to cook
because the Queen invited her to play croquet
because the Hatter invited her to drink tea
as she is in a hurry to meet the Cheshire Cat
6. Is the sentence below true or false?
The Knave of Hearts was accused of stealing the mallets.
7. What happened at the end of the story?
The knave of Hearts was beheaded at the end of his trial.
Alice saved the Knave of Hearts and helped him get out of the garden.
Alice understood that her adventures were a fantastic dream.
The Cheshire Cat helped Alice find a way back to home.
"The field with the name should be completed!"
%1$s scored %2$d out of 10 points on Graded Reader Quiz!.
" You should consider reading the story again!"
" No worries, you can check your answers and do better next time."
" Good job! You are a great reader!"
" You can see the correct answers in green color."
